text: Darren Bailey (born March 17, 1966) is an American politician. He is a Republican member of the Illinois Senate for the 55th district since 2021. Before, he was a member of the Illinois House of Representatives. He was the Republican nominee for Governor of Illinois in the 2022 election. Bailey is a conservative. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Illinois General Assembly Category:Politicians from Illinois Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Darren Bailey
